message: Returning to the real world, I find myself lying on a pile of trash.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit... What the hell."
Usui wasn't in that match...
Another ganking?
Why do I keep getting dragged into this shit?
As I start to get up, pain shoots through my skull.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Owwww!"
It feels like being stabbed with needles, but it goes away as quickly as it came, so I decide not to worry about it.
Ren is curled up by my feet. He took a few hits back there...

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey. You okay?"
He's shut down...
When I pick him up, he opens his eyes.

name: 蓮
message: "...Aoba."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you alright? You took some damage, didn't you?"
For a moment, Ren says nothing.

name: 蓮
message: "...I do feel a little off, but there don't seem to be any significant errors."

name: 蒼葉
message: "We should run a full diagnostic later. Just in case."
My Coil beeps as I'm putting him away.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hm? Someone sent me something?"

name: 蓮
message: "It's a game download."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Again?! Why now?"

name: 蓮
message: "It appears to auto-play."

name: 蒼葉
message: "An invitation... Do you think we can get into Platinum Jail with this?"

name: 蓮
message: "I think so."
As usual, the game made no sense.
...No, wait.
That game I got when Granny was kidnapped... it showed an old woman being carried off by bats to a trash mountain.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, Ren... You don't think this could be connected, do you?"

name: 蓮
message: "We don't have enough data to reach a conclusion."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Right. But... what if it is?"
A cave, a treasure chest, a key, and a door. It's gotta mean something, right?
My Coil beeps again.
This time it's a message from Mr. Haga.
There's an image attached. A map of the Old Residential District.
A spot is marked in red on the left edge of the wall surrounding Platinum Jail.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Okay, let's go."

name: 蓮
message: "Alright."
We head for the spot marked on the map.
